basics.name: Skyler Dong
basics.label: aspiring full-stack web developer
basics.summary: I'm an aspiring full-stack web developer. This is a work in progress. Check back tomorrow.

highlights: Started the company

projects.name: Labelcopier (published GitHub OAuth App)
projects.summary: Web app that copies labels and milestones from one repository to another.
highlights: Led the development of the app
Identified and fixed bugs and added new feature through 56 commits and pull requests by 'writing code' (!!USE BETTER WORDS)
Traverse through paginated API, collect responses, sort them and display them
Increase code coverage from 0% to 60% by initiated unit testing code with Jest
Increase API call speed by over 100% by making API calls asynchrnously in parallel
Deployed API written in Node with Express
Made OAuth authentication with GitHub API
Asynchronous HTTP requests
Deployed API with PM2 to 2 processes in cluster mode with a load balancer, with Nginx as the reverse proxy

projects.name: Vaniquery (published on NPM)
projects.summary: CLI tool that converts jQuery to vanilla JavaScript, written in TypeScript.
highlights: Automated the conversion of jQuery to vanilla JavaScript by utilizing regular expressions and abstract syntax trees (AST)
Increased code coverage 60% with Jest unit testing with mock data
Learned Promise and async/await
Learned regular expressions with ranges, capturing groups and backreferences.
Learned to write unit testing suite with Jest
Published the package to NPM

projects.name: Intelli Trip Planner
projects.summary: RESTful API that intelligently recommends road trip routes, written in Python
highlights: Led the development of the app
Identified and fixed bugs and added new feature through 56 commits and pull requests by 'writing code' (!!USE BETTER WORDS)
Increased code coverage from 0% to 90% by with unittest, with mock, patch and decorators
Coroutine and asynchronous
Asynchronous HTTP requests

projects.name: Personal websites
projects.summary: Web app that manages and migrates your GitHub labels and milestones.
highlights: 3rd generation: TypeScript React front-end supported by Node/Express API back-end and MongoDB Atlas, implemented with a plug-in architecture.
2nd generation: Responsive-design website utilizing a PHP back-end with a MySQL database and a front-end powered by JavaScript, Bootstrap and SCSS.
Optimize for SEO and track traffic with Google Analytics.
Independently set up and maintain the server (running on CentOS 8)
Communicate with the server via SSH and deploy code for production via Git Hook.

projects.name: Camera brand trends of Canon, Nikon and Sony
projects.summary: Data scraping, analysis and visualization with Google trends, Python and D3.js
highlights: Developed Google trend scraping tool to
Scrape Google trend indices of 3 major camera brands with Python.
Correlate annual revenues with Google trends and visualize the data with D3.js.

projects.name: Linux Ubuntu post-installation script
projects.summary: Automated program installations via Bash script.
highlights: Decreased the time needed for setting up development environments from >4 hours to 15 minutes by using this Bash script

highlights: Something
